text:
"Fixer Upper" stars Chip and Joanna Gaines. Mireya Acierto/Contributor/Getty Images

When HGTV's "Fixer Upper" first aired in 2013, the show became an instant hit.

Four years later, "Fixer Upper" stars Chip and Joanna Gaines have transformed dozens of rundown properties into beautiful homes and helped revitalize the small town of Waco, Texas.

As the Gaineses film the fifth season of their show, we decided to take a look back at some of the most unbelievable transformations featured on "Fixer Upper" so far.

Check out the stunning before-and-after photos of the 10 best house flips yet:
title: 31 before-and-after photos of Chip and Joanna's house flips on 'Fixer Upper'
